line_1: Or how the way-ward mother to chastise,
line_2: Her lessons teach to swell the capon's size;

line_1: Or how the way-ward mother to chastise,
line_2: When from her vetchy nest the weetless vagrant hies.
NASSAUS and CHURCHILLS leave the skies,

line_1: Scorn'd worth to raise, and vice in robes chastise;
line_2: Henceforth be thine, vice-gerent of the skies,

line_1: They soothe the grieved, the stubborn they chastise,
line_2: Fools they admonish, and confirm the wise:

line_1: Philistines arms the Rebels did chastize,
